src:
Ade Armando Siap Penuhi Panggilan Polisi Soal Meme Anies Berwajah Joker
05 Nov 2019, 07:01 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Polda Metro akan segera memanggil Ade Armando selaku terlapor soal meme Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan dengan wajah Joker. Pakar komunikasi, Ade Armando mengaku siap memenuhi panggilan polisi.
"Ya datanglah (penuhi panggilan polisi)," kata Ade Armando kepada wartawan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Tapi menurut Ade Armando, saat ini dia belum menerima surat panggilan dari polisi terkait laporan tersebut. Meski yang melaporkan anggota DPD RI Fahira Idris, Ade Armando akan kooperatif.
"Belum ada pemanggilan. Ya masak nggak kooperatif?" kata Ade Armando.
text:
Ade Armando Ready to Meet the Police Call Problem Joker Faced Anies Meme
05 Nov 2019, 07:01 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Polda Metro will soon summon Ade Armando as reported on the DKI Governor Anies Baswedan's meme with a Joker face. A communications expert, Ade Armando claimed to be ready to fulfill the police call.
"Yes, come (fulfill the police call)," Ade Armando told reporters on Monday (11/04/2019).
But according to Ade Armando, he has not yet received a summons from the police regarding the report. Although the one reporting on DPD RI member Fahira Idris, Ade Armando will be cooperative.
"There hasn't been a summons. Is the cook uncooperative?" said Ade Armando.
